attributes.action: Make sure there are safeguards in place so that what happened to Baby P and other children cannot happen again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Baby P is not the first but the government can make it the last child to be neglected by his family and services who should protect him. We urge the government to revise the way these cases are handle and implement safe guards to make sure it doesn't happen again. A child should be protected at the first hint of danger not put back to see if it gets worse. Parents who harm their children might be ill and need help, the child should be kept safe until this is done

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
